TEXT.S: = Haji Hassanal Bolkiah Mu'izzaddin Waddaulah (Â·) = Mntucing hngkawas 1946 idas 7 jiyax 15 ka Haji Hassanal Bolkiah Mu'izzaddin Waddaulah ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Brunei ta sayang o kiya ka Haji Hassanal Bolkiah Mu'izzaddin Waddaulah, pnaah hngkawas 1967 idas 10 jiyax 5 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
